subject: Re: Thanks for your application, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this lot will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$264,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this quick form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://surewilltoo.com/
